thread.title: Stevie Rowley
thread.title_full: Sunglasses Shop reviewed by Stevie Rowley

author: Stevie Rowley
title: Stevie Rowley
text: Ordered glasses but after 3 days hadn't received them so I call customer services , they informed me they had had some trouble with there delivery company and resent them next day delivery and I received them with no trouble , great help from customer services really big help , and mother loved glasses for Mother's Day
